instructions.header: Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up
instructions.title: How To Delete Your Wish Account When Logging In With Facebook
instructions.before: There are two different ways to sign up for Wish.com and three different ways to delete your account. If you signed up for Wish.com using your email address then you have to delete your account by navigating through the settings of Wish.  If you have signed up for Wish using facebook then you have to delete your Wish.com account by navigating through facebook. Or the third option, which applies to both forms of sign up, is to email wish and request that your account to be deleted.
thingsToRemember: The deletion process will will remove your account from Wish within the next 24 hours.
Please note that if you sign into Wish after deleting your account you will automatically reactivate your Wish account.
Deleting your Wish Account does not mean that all information previously collected by Wish and connected third parties will be permanently deleted

steps: Click the Three Bars on the Bottom Right
A screen will appear that says Wish Removed to Confirm Deletion

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 1: Open Facebook App
slides.title: Open App

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 2: Click the Three Bars on the Bottom Right
slides.title: Three Bars

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 3: Click Settings and Privacy
slides.title: Settings and Privacy

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 4: Click Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 5: Click Apps and Websites
slides.title: Apps and Websites

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 6: Click Logged in with Facebook
slides.title: Logged in with Facebook

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 7: Select Wish and Click Remove
slides.title: Remove Wish

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 8: Click Remove
slides.title: Remove

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from iOS. Step 9: A screen will appear that says Wish Removed to Confirm Deletion
slides.title: Wish Removed

steps: Go to the Facebook Website. If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Facebop home page.
Click the Arrows on the Top Right
Click the Wish App and Click Remove.

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from Website. Step 1: Go to the Facebook Website. If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Facebop home page.
slides.title: Login

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from Website. Step 2: Click the Arrows on the Top Right
slides.title: Arrows

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from Website. Step 3: Click Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from Website. Step 4: Click Apps and Websites
slides.title: Apps and Websites

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Facebook Sign Up from Website. Step 5: Click the Wish App and Click Remove.
slides.title: Remove Wish App

instructions.header: Delete Account From Email Sign Up
instructions.title: How To Delete Your Wish.com Account When Using Email To Login
instructions.before: There are two different ways to sign up for Wish.com and three different ways to delete your account. If you signed up for Wish.com using your email address then you have to delete your account by navigating through the settings of Wish.  If you have signed up for Wish using facebook then you have to delete your Wish.com account by navigating through facebook. Or the third option, which applies to both forms of sign up, is to email wish and request that your account to be deleted.
thingsToRemember: The deletion process will will remove your account from Wish within the next 24 hours.
Please note that if you sign into Wish after deleting your account you will automatically reactivate your Wish account.
Deleting your Wish Account does not mean that all information previously collected by Wish and connected third parties will be permanently deleted

steps: Tap the Three Bars on the Bottom Right

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 1: Open Wish App
slides.title: Open App

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 2: Tap the Three Bars on the Bottom Right
slides.title: Three Bars

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 3: Click Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 4: Click Account Settings
slides.title: Account Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 5: Click Deactivate Account
slides.title: Deactivate Account

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from iOS. Step 6: Click Yes to Confirm Deletion
slides.title: Yes

steps: Go to the Wish Website. If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Wish home page.
Click the Profile Icon and then Click Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from Website. Step 1: Go to the Wish Website. If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Wish home page.
slides.title: Login

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from Website. Step 2: Click the Profile Icon and then Click Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from Website. Step 3: Click Account Settings
slides.title: Account Settings

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from Website. Step 4: Click Delete Account
slides.title: Delete Account

slides.alt: Wish-Delete Account From Email Sign Up from Website. Step 5: Click Yes to Confirm Deletion
slides.title: Yes
